answers.answer: Those numbers are considered low and can lead to Diabetic coma if your level continues to drop. How are you feeling right now?

question: I NOTICED I WAS HAVING A COUPLE OF SYMPTOMS OF DIABETES SO I LOOKED UP MY DIFFERENT SYMPTOMS AND DIABETES KEPT POPPING UP.I WENT AND GOUGHT A GLUCOLSE MONITOR AND HERE ARE MY NUMBERS:54,62,64,57 WITH BEING TWO HOURS AFTER I ATE. ARE THESE NUMBERS IN THE DIABETES RANGE?SHOULD I BE TESTED?
title: do i have diabetes symptoms?
